thread.section_title: Hotel Sacha by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great choice
thread.title_full: Great choice - Review of Hotel Sacha by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Takoka72
title: Great choice
text: lovely hotel, very friendly (must be the friendliest staff I ever came across in a hotel), good location (10 mins to Scare Coeur, 5 mins to the metro and not far from Moulin Rouge), we initially were concerned about the location but was all good , rooms on the smaller side, but clean and they look good. can't really fault anything
